Text.Page:
I want to share our supply of naga antidote with Canto on the next floor down.

They've faced some of the toughest fighting, so lend a hand wherever you can.

Naga antidote! Thank you!

Take some to Trikaian over there. He got hit yesterday.

Is he serious? It was only a scratch. Well, all right...I do feel a bit hot. Of course that could just be me.

Thanks, . I hope you'll stay around and lend us a hand.
